tool_description: Calculates royalty revenues from music usage data based on rate tables, territorial rates, and platform-specific revenue sharing models.

usage_records.description: Array of validated usage record strings

rate_tables.description: Array of rate table identifiers or configurations

calculation_currency.description: Currency for revenue calculations (ISO currency code)

revenue_sharing_splits.description: Revenue sharing percentages for rights holders

error_messages: Usage limit exceeded: Maximum 200000 usage records per calculation batch.
Invalid rate tables: Provide valid rate table identifiers or configurations.
Invalid currency code: Use valid ISO 4217 currency codes.
Invalid revenue splits: Revenue sharing percentages must sum to 100% and be positive numbers.
usage: Provide usage_records and rate_tables for revenue calculation. Specify calculation_currency, deduction preferences, and revenue_sharing_splits as needed.

revenue_by_source.description: Revenue breakdown by platform and source type

calculation_summary.description: Summary of calculation methodology and assumptions
